data.text: Simple past tense and past participle of <xref>flabbergast</xref>.
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.

data.text: as if struck dumb with astonishment and surprise

examples: was thunderstruck by the news of his promotion
